I don't know if you can upgrade the actual version of Junit used in the wiz=
ards, because the API changes sufficiently from 3.7 to 3.8 that some aspect=
s of the wizards may not work. You CAN add Junit 3.8 jar file as a new requ=
ired library and select that for junit work that doesn't use the internal w=
izards.

Hope this helps.

Simon
